articles.author: Ashley Strickland, CNN
articles.title: Watch a NASA spacewalk to prepare for a space station power boost - CNN
articles.description: European Space Agency astronaut Thomas Pesquet and Japan Aerospace Exploration Agency astronaut Akihiko Hoshide embarked on a spacewalk outside the International Space Station on Sunday to prepare for more solar array upgrades.

articles.title: Another 1 million Moderna COVID 19 vaccine doses coming to Australia after EU deal - ABC News
articles.description: Scott Morrison says the vaccines will arrive from Europe as early as next week, with children as young as 12 able to receive the jab at community pharmacies.
articles.content:
Australia will receive 1 million doses of the Moderna vaccine from European nations as early as next week, with children as young as 12 to soon receive the jab at community pharmacies.

articles.author: RT
articles.title: BioNTech ‘preparing production’ of Covid-19 vaccine for children under 12, which may be approved in Europe next month – media - RT
articles.description: German company BioNTech, which in partnership with Pfizer developed one of the most widely used anti-Covid shots, says it’s preparing for the worldwide launch of its jab for younger recipients and might get approval in October.
articles.content: An mRNA vaccine against coronavirus for children aged between five and 11 years old could be approved for use in Germany in a few weeks’ time, as early as by mid-October, Der Spiegel reported on Frid… [+1898 chars]
